anathema: Allow yourself to stagnate or lose motivation, extinguish destructive blazes
edict: Be passionate and quick of wit, destroy your foes with fire, inspire your inferiors with zeal and strategy
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Ymeri (Queen of the Inferno)](/Deities.aspx?ID=697)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

Ymeri, Queen of the Inferno, holds dominion over fire, heat, and smoke. Ymeri governs from her Auroric Palace, taking the form of a six-armed reptilian centaur with burning wings. She has systematically destroyed all record of her birth and true origins, and she wages a never-ending war against the other denizens of the Plane of Fire and against the jabalis of the [Plane of Earth](/Planes.aspx?ID=30). Of all the elemental lords, Ymeri has the largest following. Some scamps and many fire elementals revere her, alongside some [ifrits](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3006) and a few other creatures of the [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=31), though few munsahirs honor her name, and a covert order of ifrits known as the Secret Fire is opposed to her rule. On Golarion, the Queen of the Inferno is worshipped primarily by fire wizards, arsonists, and [dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=395), especially cinder dragons.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elemental Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=8)

**Edicts** Be passionate and quick of wit, destroy your foes with fire, inspire your inferiors with zeal and strategy

**Anathema** Allow yourself to stagnate or lose motivation, extinguish destructive blazes

**Area of Concern**
Fire, heat, smoke

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=107), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)

- **2nd**
[Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=1698)
(fire only)

- **6th**
[Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=1749)

</column>
name: Ymeri (Queen of the Inferno)
